version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Init

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Init

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Init

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed sorting when some channels are missing. - Fixed coloring based on the amount of channels.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added GUI and many other new features to the script.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added button for setting all Channels with the same source.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added buttons for clearing samples.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added Option for skipping sampless channels. - Added Drag and Drop for swapping samples. - Added Drag and Drop files to assign samples

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added a feature for Channel 10 (drums channel): feature redistributes notes to their own tracks and renames tracks to their corresponding drum names that those pitches are mapped to by the MIDI standard.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed crashing when Channels are filtered out in the MIDI Editor. - Fixed sometimes wacky folder generation. - Fixed poor sorting for drums. - Added Roland GS drums into the drums list. - Added notes counter in the progress bars. - Tweaked style a bit. - Added hint about not entirely loaded MIDI.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Improved algorithm so it's much faster. - Added option for Disabling Interactive Generation (improves performance) - Implemented Deps checker.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Forgot to add the redirection to the ReaPack's Website if the user doesn't have one lol.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Made the MIDI error message more obvious.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Visual version change to the appropriate one.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed missed formats variable in the object.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Init release.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Removed ImGui demo script requirement.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Removed unused dependencie.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed the case where `reaper.CF_ShellExecute` didn't existed, so it would break the UI.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Kinda fixed the case when using Pooled Automation Items they would pool into other Automation Items because they used the same IDs. Sorry, I don't have motiovation to do it properly rn, it's kinda a pain in the ass.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Actually made a use of checkbox for adding aspect ratio fixer.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog:
- Made it so Flip Automation Items match each of the Media Items from start to end with play rate, it's based on the very first generated Automation Item's length.
- Added `Delete Silent Fills` util.
- Added some descriptions
- Changed default states of checkboxes.
- Fixed `Silent Extend to Next` util not extending all the items.
- Fixed Automation Items not properly generating the first time.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog:
- Made it so Flip Automation Items match each of the Media Items from start to end with play rate, it's based on the very first generated Automation Item's length.
- Added `Delete Silent Fills` util.
- Added some descriptions.
- Changed default states of checkboxes.
- Fixed `Silent Extend to Next` util not extending all the items.
- Fixed Automation Items not properly generating the first time.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed wrong playrates for Automation Items generated for flips.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Implemented Automation Items Pooling logic. Made some logic for safe pooling for generated Automation Items since reaper doesn't handle this in the API at all. - Changed `Cropper VFX` to be able to crop entire composition from one of the sides.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Adapted `ImGui.BeginChild` to new version of ReaImGui to prevent crashes. - Made it so Flip Envelopes stretch to the start of the next items now, so potentially making it more practical for editing.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Changed VFX Effects add behavior: Chroma-Key is being added, if none existed already, when applying any of the VFX effects. - Opacity now adds after Chroma-key, so no more weird unexpected color behavior because of the wrong effects order. - Changed `Scale` effect to have filtering off by default. - Some additional FAQ pages.
